/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is teeming with life, lined with trees that provide a touch of greenery amidst the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation system. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding to the overall brightness of the scene.
